traits.description: Once per long rest, you can give a heartfelt, inspiring speech. All allies within Far range clear 2 Stress.
After you make an action roll to impress, persuade, or offend someone, you can **spend a Hope** to add a **d4** to the roll.
Your moving words boost morale. Once per session, when you encourage an ally, you can do one of the following:

options.description: Allow them to find a mundane object or tool they need.
Help an Ally without spending Hope
Give them an additional downtime move during their next rest.

traits.description: Your Rally Die increases to a **d10**. Additionally, when you Help an Ally, you can narrate the moment as if you were writing the tale of their heroism in a memoir. When you do, roll a **d10** as your advantage die.
